item.title: 【Interviews / TV shows / Others】The Magic of David Copperfield : The Complete Collection
item.description:
Hello everyone,
Does anyone still have some good quality recordings of David Copperfield's TV shows and/or complete collection, please? Very hard to find online....
Thank you so much for your help on this
Yann

Examples :
Disc 1
The Magic of David Copperfield (1978) 50 Min
The Magic of David Copperfield II (1979) 50 Min
The Magic of David Copperfield III: Levitating Ferrari (1980) 50 Min
The Magic of David Copperfield IV: The Vanishing Airplane (1981) 50 Min
Disc 2
The Magic of David Copperfield V: The Statue Of Liberty Disappears (1983) 50 Min
The Magic of David Copperfield VI: Floating Over The Grand Canyon (1984) 50 Min
The Magic of David Copperfield VII: Familiares (1985) 50 Min
The Magic of David Copperfield VIII: Walking Through The Great Wall Of China (1986) 49 Min
Disc 3
The Magic of David Copperfield IX: The Escape From Alcatraz (1987) 49 Min
The Magic of David Copperfield X: The Bermuda Triangle (1988) 49 Min
The Magic of David Copperfield XI: Explosive Encounter (1989) 49 Min
The Magic of David Copperfield XII: The Niagara Falls Challenge (1990) 48 Min
Disc 4
The Magic of David Copperfield XIII: Mystery On The Orient Express (1991) 49 Min
The Magic of David Copperfield XIV: F•L•Y•I•N•G - Live The Dream (1992) 49 Min
The Magic of David Copperfield XV: Fires Of Passion 48 Min
The Magic of David Copperfield XVI: Unexplained Forces 47 Min
Disc 5
Copperfield - Tornado Of Fire (2001) 1Hr 30Min
David Copperfield: 15 Years Of Magic (1994) 1 Hr 40 Min
Disc 6
The Magic of ABC (1977) 49 Min
David Copperfield: The Great Escapes (2000) 45 Min
David Copperfield: U! - Live In Germany (1998) 1 Hr 27 Min
Magic at the Roxy Performance (1976) 8 Min
Disc 7
The Great Illusionist - The Life and Magic of David Copperfield 2 Hr
item.author: yannick1980
